tvs.caption: Header visibility
tvs.name: header_visibility
tvs.description: Do you want to display the header on this page? If you turn this off, the page starts with the content area but the navigation bar will still be visible. This setting is inherited by default, but you can change this with the Inheritance setting below.

tvs.caption: Main title
tvs.name: header_title
tvs.description: This will be displayed in the header section, below navigation bar. The text will automatically be inherited on child pages. You can override this behaviour by entering a new title or by deleting the inherited value.

tvs.caption: Subtitle
tvs.name: header_subtitle
tvs.description: This will be displayed under the main title. Will also be inherited on child pages by default.

tvs.caption: Background image
tvs.name: header_background_img
tvs.description: Use an Overview image of this resource as background. This will override the regular Background setting above and will NOT be inherited on child pages. If you want to use an image and inherit it too, add it as Global Background instead.
tvs.inputOptionValues: Use the Panorama image==background_img_pano||Use the Wide image==background_img_wide

tvs.caption: Inheritance
tvs.name: header_inheritance
tvs.description: Select which elements to display on all child pages of this resource too. NB: when you turn inheritance OFF for an element, it will return to its default value from then on. This change, however, is NOT reflected under Template Variables (yet)!
